card.title: Ernest Miller (w/ Sonny Onoo) def. Disco Inferno
Rick Steiner (c) def. Van Hammer — WCW World Television Championship
David Flair (c) (w/ Ric Flair, Samantha, Asya & Arn Anderson) def. Dean Malenko — WCW United States Heavyweight Championship
No Limit Soldiers (Konnan, Rey Mysterio Jr., Swoll & B.A.) def. West Texas Rednecks (Curt Hennig, Bobby Duncum Jr., Barry & Kendall Windham)
Fit Finlay won the Junkyard Invitational
Jersey Triad (DDP, Kanyon & Bam Bam Bigelow) (c) def. Chris Benoit & Perry Saturn — WCW World Tag Team Championship (Handicap)
Buff Bagwell (w/ Judy Bagwell) def. Roddy Piper (w/ Ric Flair) — Boxing (Mills Lane special referee)
Randy Savage & Sid Vicious def. Kevin Nash (c) & Sting — Tag match for the WCW World Heavyweight Championship (Savage pinned Nash to win title)
